main_definition: The thing that is most liked or preferred by someone.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Preferred choice or option out of many
meanings_and_examples.example: Chocolate ice cream is my favorite flavor.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person who receives special treatment because they are liked or admired
meanings_and_examples.example: The teacher gave the student a day off as their favorite due to their exceptional performance.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Someone's most loved member of a family or group
meanings_and_examples.example: His sister is his favorite child, and he enjoys spending time with her the most.
